title: A primal–dual online algorithm for the k-server problem on weighted HSTs
abstract: In this paper, we show that there is a $$\frac{5}{2}\ell \cdot \ln (1+k)$$ -competitive randomized algorithm for the k-sever problem on weighted Hierarchically Separated Trees (HSTs) with depth $$\ell $$ when $$n=k+1$$ where n is the number of points in the metric space, which improved previous best competitive ratio $$12 \ell \ln (1+4\ell (1+k))$$ by Bansal et al. (FOCS, pp 267–276, 2011).
